revised_title: Ionization Potentials of Methyl and Ethyl Free Radicals
tldr: The authors conducted experiments using molecular beams to measure the ionization potentials of free radicals, specifically methyl and ethyl. They used a space-charge detector and an ionization gauge to analyze the ionization potentials, which are important for understanding chemical reactions and identifying free radicals. This research provided valuable data and insights into the behavior of free radicals in chemical reactions.
